summary: Explores the music scene in Greenwich Village, New York in the 60's and early 70's. The film highlights some of the finest singer/songwriters of the day.
cast: Susan Sarandon|Happy Traum|Tom Bernadin|Doug Yeager|Israel Horovitz|Peter Yarrow|David Amram|Richie Havens|Oscar Brand|Judy Collins|Don McLean|Melanie|Jos√© Feliciano|John Sebastian|Tom Paxton|Pete Seeger|Arlo Guthrie|Pete Fornatale|Tom Chapin|Carolyn Hester|Buffy Sainte-Marie|Izzy Young|Daniel Drasin|Kris Kristofferson|Michelle Phillips|Terri Thal|Eric Andersen|Lucy Simon|Carly Simon|Ian Tyson|Steve Earle|Sylvia Tyson|Paul Colby|Sonny Ochs|Owen Elliot|John Doherty|Lily Chapin|Abigail Chapin|Ben Taylor|John Flynn|Bob Dylan|Joni Mitchell|Phil Ochs|Odetta|Kenny White
title: Greenwich Village: Music That Defined a Generation
